description:
Shiraha Raphiel Ainsworth, known as Raphiel, was the second-ranked angel in http://anidb.net/ch83745 [Gabriel]`s class. Though she appears to be a paragon of virtue at first glance, she inside is a sadistic stalker who often enjoys teasing http://anidb.net/ch83746 [Satanichia].
Raphiel came to earth to attend a human high school and learn about humans after graduating for her Angel School in the upper world.
name: Shiraha Raphiel Ainsworth
